Articles.Content:
13 hours ago, YANFRET said:

Chaka 1.1 Intermonkey Space Station 

-Photo Snip-

I think that's your best station yet. I like the module on the far side, away from Orion, it suggests cooperation by more than one space agency, different styles of building space station modules. I'd also love to see some modules hanging off the port and starboard CBMs too!

Hope testing is coming along well, I think the Chaka mod is what's keeping me from really playing 1.1 right now!

2 hours ago, Budgie said:

I think that's your best station yet. I like the module on the far side, away from Orion, it suggests cooperation by more than one space agency, different styles of building space station modules. I'd also love to see some modules hanging off the port and starboard CBMs too!

Hope testing is coming along well, I think the Chaka mod is what's keeping me from really playing 1.1 right now!

Trying to get this ready for you guys as soon as possible, all the new features are already developed so it's just a matter of testing out the various craft files

On 4/23/2016 at 6:38 AM, YANFRET said:

Chaka 1.1 Orion Flight Test

Just like the actual orion test flight, sans astronauts

(edit)

Edited April 27, 2016 by YANFRET
Can't wait for this to be updated to 1.1 ! Any update on a release date ?

Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems 1.1 BETA

 

ATTENTION: This is not the final 1.1 Chaka Monkey version. Please test the craft files and report any issues. Together we will ensure product quality!

Thank you for your continued Monkey Support!

 

 

1.1 BETA TEST Dropbox Link

1.1 BETA TEST Curseforge Link

1.1 BETA TEST Spacedock Link

 

Hold music for downloading tyme

 

 

 

  
1.1 Change Log

-Holy Ship!
-Many Things
-We don't like change logs :(


1.0.5 Change Log

-Change Log is pending. It works in 1.0.5, and we changed 1000 other things, so enjoy while we spend a few hours typing the change log.




1.0.4B Change Log

-Updated ALCOR IVA to new internal from Alex Ustas
-Added ALCOR Mk1-2 IVA pod to Orion
-Updated ASET props
-Added linke to Raster Prop Monitor page to encourage update

[B]* Special Thanks to ALEXUSTAS for supporting Chaka IVA function!![/B]




1.0.4 Change Log:

-Updated dependent plugins for 1.0.4
-Added "MLS - Max Hab" vehicle
-Added Exploration Launch System family of launchers and spacecraft to support beyond - Duna destinations 
-Various tweaks to craft files 
-Increased texture quality of some parts




1.0.2D Change Log:



- Increased DDS texture resolution
- High Safety Orion Parachute options
- Fixed Duna Return to Orbit lander clipping issue
- Fixed Duna Return to Orbit RCS fuel issue
- Duna heat shield separator motors 
- Deep Space Habitat craft 
- Updated Habitat Pack IVA textures
- Changed IVA for medium sized habitats
- Increased "High Power RCS" to 20
- Fixed missing or invalid career mode tags for parts
- Fixed missing IVA on crew tunnel 
- Improved fairing shapes for Duna Lander MLS vehicles
- Meet Chaka Special Feature included

 

 

Chaka Monkey Exploration Odyssey is a space program based on NASA and Boeing proposals for future missions. Part models from a wide variety of authors have been licensed, and new original models made, then combined with all new textures, sizes and configurations, to create craft files depicting the proposed missions. This project is modeled at 75% real scale.

 

♦ Recommend installing this pack into a clean KSP install for the first time.

♦ Latest version of Raster Prop Monitor needed for IVA function. Link included in download.

♦ Copy everything in provided GameData to your GameData

♦ Copy VAB folder to Ships

♦ Copy Subassemblies to your save (optional)

♦ Please remove any previous version files before installing!

 

 

 

 

Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products licensed from the  following authors:

Winston & Kickasskyle - KW Rocketry https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Alexustas - A.L.C.O.R. Pod https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

Alexustas - ASET IVA for Monkey Rover and Mk1-2 Pod https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/

Bobcat, Ind. American Pack - all rights reserved and belong to BobCat, expressed written permission from Bobcat for American Pack components to be distributed with Chaka

Tiberion - NovaPunch https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Kosmos Spacecraft Design Bureau - all rights reserved, expressed written permission from Normak and CardBoardBoxProcessor for components to be distributed with Chaka

Lionhead Aerospace https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Sumghai - SDHI Service Module System https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

Alexey Volynskov (Keramzit Procedural Fairings) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

BahamutoD - RS-68 Engine - All rights reserved - expressed written permission from BahamutoD for components to be distributed with Chaka

Sumghai / Fustek / Nothke - Habitats https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

LandeTLS - SLS Block I fairings https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

TALISAR - Talisar Large Upper Stage https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

Porkjet - Habitat IVAs - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ and expressed written permission from Porkjet for components to be distributed with Chaka

Blackheart612 - Aerojet Kerbodyne https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/ expressed written permission from Blackheart612 for components to be distributed with Chaka

Kommitz - Chaka Nuclear Thermal Engines https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

Nertea - Octo-Girder Argon Segment https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

NoOneSpecial - NOS Altair pod and lander https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

Hanson Ma / xxhansonmaxx - CST-100 Parachute and NDS https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

cxg2827 - CXaerospace Station Parts https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/us/

 

Chaka the Monkey would like to extend a special thank you to these developers. They worked very hard to make these parts and we have organized them for Monkey Exploration because they are excellent. Also Chaka wishes to thank our excellent beta test team: Voidryder, AJLSpace85, JoseEduardo, MeCripp, Probus, Drj3199 for putting in many hours of science which made the quality of this release possible. 

 

Special technical services provided by MeCripp Industrial Coding, LLC

 

 

Advanced Monkey Rover Wheels provided by

BMW, AG

Edited April 27, 2016 by YANFRET

Absolutely amazing work Yanfret. 

From my small amount of testing, the only thing that I have to say is that the Orion parachute may not have enough drag. I splashed down at about 18.7 m/s.
@YANFRET believe me it's awesome that you updated CMES, but please, keep your enormous images under spoiler!

16 hours ago, YANFRET said:

Chaka Monkey Exploration Systems includes products licensed from the  following authors

can I get a bit of clarification on this? Does this pack actually package these parts or just make use of these parts models/textures for its own parts? What happens when we already have all or some of these mods installed?

31 minutes ago, Gaiiden said:

can I get a bit of clarification on this? Does this pack actually package these parts or just make use of these parts models/textures for its own parts? What happens when we already have all or some of these mods installed?

The parts have been duplicated and retextured, and exist in their own folder. You shouldn't have any issue if you already have these packs in your game data folder
i have problem whit docking station core and solarpanel module (single one) , two part bounce away its look like colliders are mess up.

8 hours ago, tees said:

i have problem whit docking station core and solarpanel module (single one) , two part bounce away its look like colliders are mess up.

(EDIT)

We can confirm this may be a KSP issue. Sometimes docking station craft crashes the program. We will evaluate contributions to this issue of Chaka dock ports, thank you for bringing this to our attention.

However, exiting KSP and re loading the craft results in functional docking.

 

Edited April 27, 2016 by YANFRET

15 hours ago, trooperMNG said:

@YANFRET believe me it's awesome that you updated CMES, but please, keep your enormous images under spoiler!

With as much respect for this request as possible, it's just not gonna happen

We will try to keep things under control, but this forum thread has always been plastered with images.

12 hours ago, YANFRET said:

this forum thread has always been plastered with images.
Awwww yisssss, that station is looking good! Even the spherical hab module, which I usually dislike, seems to fit now.

I found a pretty nasty bug. I used the return to orbit Duna lander craft file and attempted to land it on Minmus. I had the legs down and as soon as I touched down onto the surface, the craft bounced violently off the surface and started spinning end over end. I stabilized the craft and attempted a second landing and the same thing happened. As soon as the landing legs touched the surface, the craft went haywire.

3 hours ago, bigshow281 said:

I found a pretty nasty bug. I used the return to orbit Duna lander craft file and attempted to land it on Minmus. I had the legs down and as soon as I touched down onto the surface, the craft bounced violently off the surface and started spinning end over end. I stabilized the craft and attempted a second landing and the same thing happened. As soon as the landing legs touched the surface, the craft went haywire.

Agreed. We applied a fix for that, seems it's not working. We will test it with the legs up and down and see if a solution can be brought to you quickly.
I'm not sure if this is really a bug but I have a 5820K and 980ti and I am get about 10-12 fps at launch. When I remove Chaka, I get my 60+ fps back. I didnt think that made that much sense...
Not getting anything on the screens

3 hours ago, Courn Wallace said:

I'm not sure if this is really a bug but I have a 5820K and 980ti and I am get about 10-12 fps at launch. When I remove Chaka, I get my 60+ fps back. I didnt think that made that much sense...

Something's not right there. Does this happen with all craft files? Does it happen for you on a clean install plus Chaka? Can you post a screenshot of your debug screen when it's happening?
I will do those things and get back to you!

23 hours ago, bigshow281 said:

I found a pretty nasty bug. I used the return to orbit Duna lander craft file and attempted to land it on Minmus. I had the legs down and as soon as I touched down onto the surface, the craft bounced violently off the surface and started spinning end over end. I stabilized the craft and attempted a second landing and the same thing happened. As soon as the landing legs touched the surface, the craft went haywire.

Update: after discussing options with the manufacturer, the decision has been made to make a new model with updated landing leg animations, which may be ready very soon.

until then, you can still land in "safe mode" by keeping the legs up or adding extra landing gear.

4 minutes ago, YANFRET said:

Update: after discussing options with the manufacturer, the decision has been made to make a new model with updated landing leg animations, which may be ready very soon.

until then, you can still land in "safe mode" by keeping the legs up or adding extra landing gear.

Awesome! Thank you and all those involved for your continued work on this awesome mod. Keep up the great work.

18 hours ago, NateDaBeast said:

 

Not getting anything on the screens

Looks like you need the newest RPM download from github. Make sure your version is up to date.
